title: How to Change Your TikTok Username or Nickname

steps.title: Open TikTok and tap the Profile button.
steps.content: Open TikTok and tap the Profile button. It's in the lower-right corner and has an icon of a person on it.

steps.title: Tap Edit profile.
steps.content: Tap Edit profile . This button is under your username, profile picture , and account stats.

steps.title: Tap Username.
steps.content: Tap Username . Don't click Name as this will edit your account nickname instead. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your desired username.
steps.content: Enter your desired username. You can use letters, numbers, underscores, and periods in your username, but note that periods cannot be at the end of your username. You must pick a unique username and can only change your username once every 30 days. If you give up a username, you will not be able to use that username on a different account for a short time, but TikTok does not specify how long this period is. Changing your username also changes the URL to your profile.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Your username will be automatically updated.

steps.title: Open TikTok and tap the Profile button.
steps.content: Open TikTok and tap the Profile button. It's in the lower-right corner and has an icon of a person on it.

steps.title: Tap Edit profile.
steps.content: Tap Edit profile . This button is under your username, profile picture, and account stats.

steps.title: Tap Name.
steps.content: Tap Name . Your nickname is your display name on your profile as well as on the For You page, friends tab, and in direct messages and comments. If you don't set a nickname, it will be the same as your username. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your desired nickname.
steps.content: Enter your desired nickname. Nicknames can be up to 30 characters long and must adhere to TikTok's Community Guidelinesâ€”so make sure your nickname is appropriate and not offensive. Note that you can only change your nickname once every seven days.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Your nickname will be automatically updated.
